instruction.value: Instill in LEFT eye just prior to procedure.
Instill in RIGHT eye just prior to procedure.
Instill in affected eye just prior to procedure.
Instill in LEFT eye every 5 minutes for 5 to 7 doses.
Instill in LEFT eye every 10 minutes for 5 to 7 doses.
Instill in RIGHT eye every 5 minutes for 5 to 7 doses..
Instill in RIGHT eye every 10 minutes for 5 to 7 doses..
Instill in affected eye every 5 minutes for 5 to 7 doses..
Instill in affected eye every 10 minutes for 5 to 7 doses..
